content: 2.2 不可描述 ¶2.2.1 四级 ¶非常帮 $$ \begin{aligned} P\left(X=x | Y=c_{k}\right) &=P\left(X^{(1)}=x^{(1)}, \cdots, X^{(n)}=x^{(n)} | Y=c_{k}\right) \\ &=\prod_{j=1}^{n} P\left(X^{(j)}=x^{(j)} | Y=c_{k}\right) \end{aligned} $$ ddd ddd
